TenantSecurityConfigAgent.name: TenantSecurityConfigAgent
TenantSecurityConfigAgent.description: Stores metric details related to implemented Agentforce Agents

Action.description: The action taken on the configured agent within a tenant.

ActionBy.description: The user who made this change.

ActionDate.description: The date this action was taken.

AgentName.description: The name of the configured agent.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique across all tenants.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

Name.description: The API name of the agent.

Status.description: The status, active or inactive, of the agent version.
